reviews.sentence: An ok hotel for a short stay. The hotel is basic the pool is not very big and the professional pictures can be misguiding but for a short stay it is ok. Though we had prepaid and breakfast was supposed to be included in our stay the receptionist claimed it was not and agreed to offer us coffee and some fried veggies and eggs not the full breakfast. No bottled water in the room and after travelling for 12 hours coming from Europe I think that at least some bottled water should be provided along with a mini fridge which would be handy.

Close to the beach but not 4 stars. I would not be so bad if not for 2 major issues. I planned these vacations for a long time and chose this hotel primarily because it has good reviews and included the breakfast and airport shuttle. My greatest disappointment is the breakfast. It was literally horrible. Cheapest juice a poor Bagel and tasteless coffee. after second breakfast in this place I said enough and I decided to go to other places. I ended up paying for my breakfast but at least I got the breakfast. second issue One day before leaving I ask for the shuttle I had flight at 10 AM I was told that they can only provide the shuttle starting. 9 am and if I need it earlier I have to pay it myself. So I ended up again to pay for what supposed to be included. In brief for hotel that included breakfast and shuttle I had to pay for breakfast and for the shuttle. Close to the beach and the room was big enough. Absolutely not eating In the restaurant downstairs. Restaurant this place really need another restaurant.

Overall stay. I like the location of the hotel. Very close to everything on the strip. The pool area was my fav chill out spot. Very chills but I just wish the bar area was open before the free happy hour. The staff was very acomdating to your nedsThe hotel was not that bad as the other reviews I have read prior to booking. We had to switch rooms be our first room toilet was leaking. Told two pl from maintaince problem was not fixed. we will wake up to water on the bathroom floor. Second the walls are extremely thin. Our new room we were next store to some loud a room neighbors from Ny that was up in the wee hours 56am they were so loud it sounded as if they were in our room.

Nice hotel close to the beach. Rooms were clean and very good size enough space for a doble room with 3 people. The bad part was the breakfast. First of all the lady was heedless and not always on time. The table was not set you had to ask for food in the bar. Milk and jelly were offered from their original package and margarine not butter was put on a paper plate. Coffee of a bad quality served in a cup without a plate. The employees are very nice specially the ones who work at the reception. Very good location very close to the principal area of south beach. Hotel should not offer breakfast because of the poor quality better if they just serve coffee.
The pool is terrible the furniture are old the restaurant old.

Our stay at the Clinton was not a pleasant one I am very displeased. The room was very small. The jetted jacuzi was disgustingly dirty and we did not use it. There were old opened soda and water bottles in our refrigerator from previous guests and used glasses still with a liquid in them in our windowsill. The VIP club passes were useless we were charged 30 per person for club entry. Breakfast consisted of only toast or bagels. The airport transportation was unavailable for our flights so we had to pay for taxi both ways. The limited complimentary happy hour only consisted of gin or vodka. The hotel pool was dirty. I never saw anyone in it but I did see smokers making use of it by discarding their cigarette butts. We were celebrating a birthday and were very disappointed. I will not be back at the Clinton Hotel.

Had the same experience as Daniel Baret Choose another hotel in the area. the restaurant under renovation but not yet started shuttle service stopped 3 days before our arrival. the hotel is generally worn therefore choose another and pay a little more it is worth the money. my credit card was Copied fraud. funny for the only place I used it was at the hotel.
The staff was great. No problems. I think there breakfast could improve.

Nice location friendly staff. I have been in many hotels so I know what a bad hotel is. This hotel has great location excellent staff comfortable room. Bad side is thin walls shower has no soap ledge for soap or shampoo reminds me of a quick beach shower. Continental breakfast was only open for one day notice sign on window it was being leased. That might be why. Otherwise good hotel great staff and comfortable room.
It was horrible hotel. Nothing. Room pool breakfast car parking everything was really bad.
Great for overnight stay. Continental breakfast was superb. Lobby was nice. Staff very friendly.
Very clean and close to the beach and restaurants. Very nice experienceand clean. I would definetly go back to Clinton Hotel and time. Regards Patrick.

great location near beach. I had a very great time check. in was easy. Got there before our time and the young ladies at the counter got us in early. My room was super comfortable the bed was the best. The pool could use a update it is very small. The breakfast had a good selection from coffee tea and orange juice to bread and bagels and cereal. The beach is two short blocks away. Great food all around the mall is in walking distance. The staff location and the bed. Two blocks away from the beach. Different kinds of food all around sushi burgers Mexican. The pool area.

Great location. 2 blocks from Ocean Dr. Decent hotel close to hot spots in Miami beach. Not a 4 stars though. Staff very friendly clean rooms but elevator very small plus breakfast disappointing. worth it for the price. Location 2 blocks from Ocean Dr breakfast and pool area.

Not what it seems. This hotel look so good online. However when you actually get to the hotel the rooms are so small and the pool forget it it is even smaller. So be careful with the pictures it is not what is seems. The beds after all extremely comfortable but I can barely walk in the room of how small it is. My friends and I called it the miniature since everything was so small. Location is great literally two blocks down from ocean drive and there are many food restaurants around.
Comfortable hotel. An excellent stay thank you for providing a most comfortable hotel. Pool was good. Beach umbrella was at an extre 20 charge. Breakfast good to be included a good start to the day.
Very clean close to the beach and dining.
Good location bad breakfast.

Clinton Hotel is a decent spot. My room was smaller than it sounded as advertised but its simplicity and cleanliness made up for it. Perfect place for people who go out more than stay inside. The staff is super friendly even when being stressed out by other guests. The complimentary breakfast next door was okay. It does the job as far as food goes but it was not their strong point.

The swimming pool is very small. They put washcloths for the first night and do n’t replace them and only one rob. They also only put on toilet paper for the stay and we stayed for 3 nights. By the third night there was no more. The valet parking is 38 night and it takes them 30 minutes to get your car. The complementary breakfast is a complete ripof. You can only have one thing on the menu and it is very limited. Only have cereal a bagel with cream cheese fruit salad and pancakes. Plus you can only have one drink as well. Very misleading.
